title: Design Thinking Game Modding Workshop: Creative Approaches to Mathematical Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental design thinking concepts and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Offline collaborative learning environment utilizing smartphone-based game modding tools, with the application of design thinking methodology in the mathematical problem-solving process

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 5 stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test) to mathematical problem-solving through team-based game modding
Learners enhance creative collaboration skills while solving complex mathematical problems using game modding outputs
Learners develop the ability to visualize the design thinking process and improve prototypes incorporating feedback using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
